amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to implement community service requirements for public housing tenants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available in the Act from being used to implement section 12(c) of the United States Housing Act of 1937 (42 U.S.C. 1437j(c)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A047) Failed by voice vote.
